title: Google Pixel 4 - "Ultrasound"/High pitch noises when moving phone with the Camera app opened
content:
So, when moving the phone from left to right while the Camera app is opened I can hear some kind of "ultrasound"/high pitch noise from the camera module.
I've recorded it, here's the video (headphones are recommended) - https://youtu.be/dQrY9VhIWdg
My friend's Pixel 4 XL has the same issue (headphones are recommended) - https://youtu.be/E2sl1eEXhjQ

I created a thread on Reddit and seems like other people have the same issue. Here's the link - https://www.reddit.com/r/GooglePixel/comments/g7ulig/google_pixel_4_ultrasoundhigh_pitch_noises_when/

The 6 people out of 75 have the same issue which is pretty high percentage (8%) of devices.

There's one more issue which can be linked with this one - There are 'clicks' when switching the Camera app modes (e.h. Camera/Portrait/Video).
